    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • playTheGame

        public void playTheGame()
        The play game method will ask the user how much he would like to bet and then it will deal cards to both dealer and player.

      • checkBlackJack

        public boolean checkBlackJack()
        If dealer has blackjack game ends and if player has blackjack then player wins.
        Returns:
        whether a person produces a blackjack or not.

      • playersChoice

        public void playersChoice()
        method will ask if the player would like to hit or stay

      • dealersTurn

        private void dealersTurn()
        Once players turn is over the dealer will then hit if it is under 17 and if greater than 21 it will bust. Once over or at 17 it will stay.

      • winLosePush

        private void winLosePush()
        This program will see whether the dealer or player has won , tied(push) or lost. checks the scores to see who has busted or who has a larger score while being under 21.
